refnamediv.refpurpose: Save Extended Attributes (EAs) in a tdb file

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This VFS module is part of the samba 7 suite.

The vfs_xattr_tdb VFS module stores Extended Attributes (EAs) in a tdb file. This enables the usage of Extended Attributes on OS and filesystems which do not support Extended Attributes by themselves.

listitem.para: Name of the tdb file the EAs are stored in. If this option is not set, the default filename xattr.tdb is used.
